briefdescription.para: Number of entries in the fixed table.

memberdef.argsstring: (int lmax, int nmax, double r, Eigen::MatrixXd &p, int tid)
memberdef.name: get_dens

detaileddescription.para:
Get derivative of potential
lmax
is the maximum harmonic order
nmax
is the maximum radial order
r
is the evaluation radius
d
will be returned array in harmonics l and radial order n for the density
tid
is the thread enumerator that allows the function to provide some thread safety

will be returned array in harmonics l and radial order n for the derivative of the potential

memberdef.argsstring: (double rmin, double rmax, int lmax, int nmax)
memberdef.name: make_grid

briefdescription.para: Make the density and potential grid.

detaileddescription.para: Computes the potential, acceleration and density using eigenfunctions of the Spherical Laplacian: spherical Bessel functions
